item.title: kubernetes crash course for java developers
item.description: Course Notes for Kubernetes crash course of java developers This article contains the notes for the Kubernetes crash course of java developers by Ranga Rao on Udemy. You can find this course here. This is my first attempt to create notes for courses. Click on the image to open the pdf
